events.name: Christmas Party
events.description: Saddle up for the most festive and hop-tastic event of the season - the Horsemen of the Hopocalypse Christmas Party!
events.fullDescription: Join us as we transform your holiday celebrations into a beer lover's paradise. Indulge in a spirited evening filled with the finest brews, joyous camaraderie, and a touch of Christmas magic.
events.location: Hampton Inn & Suites, 1600 Hurst Town Center Dr, Hurst, TX

highlights.title: BEER GALORE
highlights.description: Immerse yourself in a world of craft beers that will tantalize your taste buds and keep the good times flowing all night long.

highlights.title: FUN RAFFLES
highlights.description: Take a chance and try your luck with our entertaining raffles! Prizes suitable for any homebrewer!
